resources.string: These are times of civil war. Rebel ships have attacked from a secret base and have won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire. During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal the secret blueprints for the Empire\'s most extreme weapon, the DEATH STAR, an armored space station with enough power to destroy an entire planet. home in his spaceship, as he safeguards the blueprints that can save his people and restore freedom to the galaxy...
